scripts.postinstall: cd api && go mod download && cd ../frontend && npm i && cd ../ && npm run create-cert
scripts.clean:full: rimraf -v -I api/server api/server.exe api/data dist frontend/dist frontend/node_modules node_modules photogallery.localhost.pem photogallery.localhost-key.pem
scripts.dev:backend: cd api && cross-env LOCAL_DEV_ENV=true IMAGE_PATH=E:/photography ADMIN_USER=admin ADMIN_PASSWORD=password go run .
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run caddy" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build:backend: cd api && go build -o server . && cpy server . --rename=server.exe
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && cpy dist ../
scripts.build: cross-env CGO_ENABLED=0 npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.preview: concurrently "npm run caddy:preview" "cd api && cross-env LOCAL_DEV_ENV=true IMAGE_PATH=E:/photography ADMIN_USER=admin ADMIN_PASSWORD=password server.exe"
